message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,500. I believe this product will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $10,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $11,000. Would you be willing to consider $10,750?
